dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.bi.BusinessInteractionRelationship
dataStructure.description:
An association between two Interactions. For example, a Notification sent to customers affected by a problem contained on a Trouble Report.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: BusinessInteractionRelationship

child.name: type
child.description:
A categorization of the relationship, such as bulk, parent/child, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: type

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the relationship is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
